segments.text: The little girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem worried about her brother falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this kind of thing all the time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s reaching up with her hand open is so innocent and sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it’s also kind of sad that she’s being taught to sneak like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t grow up thinking it’s okay to take things without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going to hurt himself if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just going to stand there and watch it happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and teach them a better way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a cute scene, but it’s also a little heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR
